title: Single-page marketing website for PMK TOWING SERVICE (Nellore)

requirements.text: Create a responsive marketing website for “PMK TOWING SERVICE”, describing a car towing and recovery service in Nellore, using English for all user-facing text.

quotes:
Create website for PMK TOWING SERVICE 
For car towing recovery service in Nellore

acceptanceCriteria: The site loads as a complete, coherent website with clear branding for “PMK TOWING SERVICE”.
All visible text is in English.
Layout is responsive and usable on mobile and desktop.

requirements.text: Add prominent contact actions using the provided phone number +917842969695, including a click-to-call link (tel:) and at least one persistent call-to-action button visible on mobile.
acceptanceCriteria: The phone number is displayed exactly as “+917842969695”.
At least one button/link uses a tel:+917842969695 href and works in the browser.
A call-to-action is visible without scrolling on a typical mobile viewport (e.g., in the hero section or a sticky footer).

requirements.text: Include clearly labeled sections appropriate for a towing/recovery service website: Hero, Services, Service Area (Nellore), and Contact.

quotes: For car towing recovery service in Nellore

acceptanceCriteria: Navigation or clear page structure allows users to find Services, Service Area (Nellore), and Contact information quickly.
Services section lists towing/recovery offerings in plain English (no placeholder lorem ipsum).

requirements.text: Apply a cohesive visual theme suitable for an emergency roadside/towing business (distinct color palette, typography, spacing, and component styling) and enforce it consistently across all sections (avoid a blue/purple-dominant palette).
acceptanceCriteria: The site uses a consistent theme (colors, typography, buttons, section styling) across all sections.
Primary theme is not dominated by blue/purple.

requirements.text: Add generated static image assets to support the website (logo and hero visual), store them under frontend/public/assets/generated, and render them in the UI.
acceptanceCriteria: The generated images exist under frontend/public/assets/generated with the specified filenames.
The logo appears in the header/hero area and the hero image/illustration appears in the hero section.
Images are loaded as static assets (not served from the backend).

constraints: Do not modify any files under frontend/src/components/ui (compose them instead).
Do not modify immutable hook/bootstrap files: frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.tsx, frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, frontend/src/main.tsx.

required: Simple bold logo mark with tow-truck silhouette and text “PMK TOWING SERVICE” (pmk-logo.dim_512x512.png)
Wide hero illustration/photo-style graphic of a car being safely towed on a road with a clean background (pmk-hero.dim_1600x900.png)
